title: Bird of Paradise (Adventure, 1932) Dolores del Rio, Lon Chaney Jr, John Halliday | Movie

sources.title: Bird of Paradise (Adventure, 1932) Dolores del Rio, Lon Chaney Jr, John Halliday | Movie
sources.description:
A young American falls madly in love with a beautiful Polynesian woman during a trip to the South Pacific islands. Luana gives in to his advances but the couple is threatened by the promise of the girl's father to marry her to the prince of a neighboring island. The two lovebirds in paradise then decide to run away.

Original title: Bird of Paradise
Film debut of Lon Chaney Jr., billed under his real name of Creighton Chaney.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/D3ccUtTqm5I

Director: King Vidor
Writers: Richard Walton Tully, Wells Root, Wanda Tuchock
Stars: Dolores del Rio, Joel McCrea, John Halliday, & Creighton Chaney
Genres: Adventure, Drama, Romance

This film is available with English, Italian, Russian & Spanish audio options.  And subtitled in many more languages.
